duties_responsibilities.duty: Commercialize the Samsung Exynos modem in the North American market.
Understand North American Cellular carrier requirements and analyze field/equipment new feature logs related to 5G/4G technologies.
Participate in new feature development and debugging for North American carrier requirements.
Manage onsite customer support, resolve escalated issues, and work with off-shore team to analyze new feature logs.
Collaborate closely with the global protocol team to resolve North America customer issues found in lab/field/IOT/carrier test.
Take ownership in the development of commercial modem software.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's with 5+ years of relevant industry experience, or Masters with 3+ years, or PhD in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field (PhD preferred)
